# sda_link (Resource)

Manages an asset link resource in the SDA Assets Management Service. Links connect two assets together with optional metadata.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `destination_id` (String) The destination ID of the asset link. This is the ID of the asset (resource) to which the link is created.
- `destination_type` (String) The destination type of the asset link (DEVICE, DOCUMENT, GATEWAY, LICENSE, PROJECT, TAG, VAULT, SECRET, etc.).
- `source_id` (String) The source ID of the asset link. This is the ID of the asset (resource) from which the link is created.
- `source_type` (String) The source type of the asset link (DEVICE, DOCUMENT, GATEWAY, LICENSE, PROJECT, TAG, VAULT, SECRET, etc.).

### Optional

- `meta_data` (String) Metadata for the asset link in JSON format. The structure depends on the asset types being linked.

### Read-Only

- `creation_timestamp` (String) Date and time when this object was first created (ISO 8601 format).
- `creation_user_id` (String) Unique identifier of the user who created this object.
- `object_version` (Number) Version number of the object, used for optimistic locking and change tracking.
- `update_timestamp` (String) Date and time when this object was last modified (ISO 8601 format).
- `update_user_id` (String) Unique identifier of the user who last updated this object.
